about_us_description: Open Sea Company Ltd is a fast-growing Tanzanian company specializing in healthcare services, medical and laboratory supplies, vehicle spare parts, and general goods distribution. Committed to quality and compassion, we serve public institutions, NGOs, and private clients nationwide.
vision_description: To be the most trusted and dynamic provider of healthcare, logistics, and supply services in the region.
mission_description:
Deliver high-quality, affordable services
Strengthen access to essential healthcare and industrial products
Serve with professionalism, compassion, and reliability
values_description:
Compassion – Humanity first
Integrity – Ethical actions always
Reliability – Dependable delivery
Innovation – Smart and modern
Versatility – One provider, many solutions

medical_hero_desc: Access world-class healthcare beyond borders with trusted global partnerships.
case_desc: Diagnosed with early breast cancer, Mama Asha was treated in China using cryotherapy. She returned after 2 weeks and continued follow-up via Zoom and email.
affordable_desc: Yes! Thanks to our trusted hospital partnerships, we offer significant savings. For example, a child's heart surgery may cost Tsh 20M in China compared to Tsh 50M elsewhere.
contact_desc: We support you every step of the journey.
service_1: Coordination of treatments: Cancer, Cardiology, Neurology, Fertility, etc.
service_2: Referrals to top hospitals in China, Turkey, India, etc.
service_3: Visa support, flights, accommodation, and transport.

hero.title: Delivering Quality. Advancing Life

faq.title: Explore Medical Referral Questions
faq.q1: Where can cancer patients be referred?
faq.a1:
Cancer patients can be referred to China. The treatment methods include:
1. Chemotherapy
2. Radiation therapy
3. Targeted therapy
4. Immunotherapy
5. Cryotherapy
6. Hormone therapy
7. Bone marrow/stem cell transplant
faq.q2: Where can cardiac treatment patients be referred?
faq.a2:
Cardiac treatment patients can be referred to Turkey. Procedures include:
1. Angioplasty
2. Stent placement
3. Bypass surgery
4. Thrombolysis
5. Heart transplant
6. Implantable device
faq.q3: Where can patients go for cosmetic or aesthetic surgery?
faq.a3:
Patients can be referred to India and South Africa for cosmetic/aesthetic surgery:
1. Rhinoplasty
2. Blepharoplasty
3. Facelift
4. Botox and fillers
5. Dental aesthetic treatment
6. Brazilian butt lift
7. Tummy tuck
8. Liposuction
9. Breast surgery
